labels.analysis: The MCP Server is designed to expose Local Falcon's reporting capabilities as tools that can be seamlessly integrated with AI agents and workflows. It provides a range of functionalities to retrieve detailed reports such as scans, trends, keywords, competitor analysis, campaigns, and guard reports. The tools focus on local SEO data, allowing users to gather comprehensive analytics directly through the protocol. This data can be used for search engine optimization, competitive analysis, and monitoring business performance in specific locations.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality of the server revolves around retrieving and analyzing local SEO and business performance data. This aligns closely with the "Data Analysis & Processing" category, as the tools enable analytics, data transformation, and insights generation. "Web Search & Research" is also relevant because it involves gathering detailed search-related data from Local Falcon. A custom label has been added to highlight its specific niche in local SEO analytics.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Local Falcon MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @local-falcon/mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Expose Local Falcon's reporting capabilities as MCP tools to seamlessly integrate with AI agents and workflows. Retrieve detailed scan, trend, keyword, competitor, campaign, and guard reports directly through the protocol. Enhance your AI applications with comprehensive local SEO data and analytics from Local Falcon.

tools.name: listLocalFalconScanReports
tools.description: Deploy Server Local Falcon MCP Server Claim Server @local-falcon/mcp Try in Playground listLocalFalconScanReports

tools.name: listLocalFalconTrendReports
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all Trend Reports performed by your Local Falcon account.

tools.name: listLocalFalconAutoScans
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all Auto Scans.

tools.name: listAllLocalFalconLocations
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all locations.

tools.name: listLocalFalconLocationReports
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all location reports.

tools.name: getLocalFalconLocationReport
tools.description: Retrieves a single location report. A location report looks like https://www.localfalcon.com/reports/location/view/c60c325a8665c4a where c60c325a8665c4a is the report key.

tools.name: getLocalFalconReport
tools.description: Retrieves a single Local Falcon scan report given a report key. Only reads the ai analysis of the returned report. Otherwise report the ai analysis is not present. Users can also enter the report key in the format of https://www.localfalcon.com/reports/view/0b38313fa35c37f where 0b38313fa35c37f is the report key.

tools.name: getLocalFalconTrendReport
tools.description: Retrieves a single Local Falcon trend report. A trend report looks like https://www.localfalcon.com/reports/trend/view/95290829819f6e8 where 95290829819f6e8 is the report key.

tools.name: listLocalFalconKeywordReports
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all keyword reports. A keyword report looks like https://www.localfalcon.com/reports/keyword/view/754ffcb0f309938 where 754ffcb0f309938 is the report key.

tools.name: getLocalFalconKeywordReport
tools.description: Retrieves a single Local Falcon keyword report.

tools.name: getLocalFalconGrid
tools.description: A helper method to create a Local Falcon grid.

tools.name: getLocalFalconGoogleBusinessLocations
tools.description: Fetches Local Falcon Google Business locations.

tools.name: getLocalFalconRankingAtCoordinate
tools.description: Retrieves search results at the specified coordinate point and gets ranking data for specified business.

tools.name: getLocalFalconKeywordAtCoordinate
tools.description: Retrieves search results at the specified coordinate point without any rank comparison data.

tools.name: runLocalFalconFullGridSearch
tools.description: Retrieves a full grid search using the passed keyword or search term to match against the specified business.

tools.name: getLocalFalconCompetitorReports
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all Competitor Reports within your Local Falcon account.

tools.name: getLocalFalconCompetitorReport
tools.description: Retrieves up to 20 competitor businesses from a specific Competitor Report from your Local Falcon account. Competitor reports look like https://www.localfalcon.com/reports/competitor/view/08116fb5331e258 where 08116fb5331e258 is the report_key.

tools.name: listLocalFalconCampaignReports
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all Location Reports within your Local Falcon account.

tools.name: getLocalFalconCampaignReport
tools.description: Retrieves a full report of a Campaign from your Local Falcon account. Campaign reports look like https://www.localfalcon.com/campaigns/view/0ee3c5869f3fa13 where 0ee3c5869f3fa13 is the report_key.

tools.name: listLocalFalconGuardReports
tools.description: Retrieves a list of all Falcon Guard Reports within your Local Falcon account. This helps analyze the Google Business profile of a specific location.

tools.name: getLocalFalconGuardReport
tools.description: Retrieves a full report of a Falcon Guard Report from your Local Falcon account given a place_id.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@local-falcon/mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
